attributes.action: Sack incompetent England manager Steve McClaren
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The above mentioned person in failing to steer the England football team through the easiest of Euro 2008 Qualifying groups has brought shame on our proud Footballing nation. We petition the England manager to have the good grace not just as the England manager but also as a man to do the decent thing and step down. The above mentioned has, throughout the campaign made elementary mistakes costing us qualification. Steve we didnt relly want you in the first place now you are the first three lions manager for years not to make a major tournament...please step down

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
